CustomField.description: This property will determine the increment factor when a document is checked in without redlines. Acceptable values for this field are "Major" or "Minor". The default value is Major
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This property will determine the increment factor when a document is checked in without redlines. Acceptable values for this field are "Major" or "Minor". The default value is Major
CustomField.label: Increment Checkin Without Redlines
